content: Just landed in NYC after an amazing trip in Japan. Feeling inspired to mix finance with creativity. Not sure how yet, but I'm starting with a data analysis course.
raw_content: Just touched down in NYC after an incredible journey in Japan. The experience has sparked a new drive to blend my finance background with the creative energy I've absorbed. Excited, yet a bit uncertain about how to merge these worlds in NYC's dynamic landscape. Next step: enrolling in a data analysis course to bridge the gap.

related_goals.goal: Complete a professional development course in data analysis or machine learning to enhance skills relevant to quant trading and creative outlets
Build a portfolio of creative work by producing at least 5 pieces for public viewing or sale
